name: WP BlueLevel PlugNPlay Preloader
author: Bluelevel

sections.description:
Preloaders are a part of smart websites. It generally involves a few lines of delicate coding if you want to integrate a preloader on your website pages. Even the plug-in repository does not help you with a plug-in which integrates excellent looking preloaders and doesn’t require any coding. Relax, here you have one. Just install this plug-in and you are done. Choose from more than 50 different brilliant preloader animations, change color, change background color even set the size as you desire. BlueLevel PlugNPlay preloader is the only plugin which gives you so much of freedom without a single line of coding. And it is absolutely free. Unbelievable, isn’t it ?

  • Fully responsive
  • Retina ready
  • All css3 animations
  • Only 150k, loads fastest
  • 50+ animations
  • Ability to add different sizes
  • Ability to assign custom colors
  • Automatically takes your sites title while loading
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-bluelevel-plugnplay-preloader directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the WP BlueLevel PlugNPlay Preloader screen to configure the plugin
  4. And you’re done! No coding needed!
sections.faq:
Is this plugin responsive?

Yes. This plugin is built with CSS3 animations, which makes it absolutely responsive and retina ready.

What if I don’t configure the plugin?

If you don’t configure the plugin, it will work with its default options.

Any other problem you’re having?

No worries, just email us at support@bluelevel.in and we’ll solve it for you!
